Chapter 18 Pareto Charts for Ranking Problems # print structure of ae data str(ae) ## 'data.frame': 131 obs. of 2 variables: ## $ severity: chr "E" "F" "E" "F" ... ## $ category: chr "Pressure ulcer" "Gastrointestinal" "Infection" "Infection" ... paretochart(ae$category) paretochart(ae$severity) ae.tbl category count 1 Fall 1 2 Gastrointestinal 40 3 Infection 34 4 Medication 18 5 Other 4 6 Pressure ulcer 5 7 Procedure 29 ae.cat <- rep(ae.tbl$category, ae.tbl$count) head(ae.cat) ## [1] Fall Gastrointestinal Gastrointestinal Gastrointestinal ## [5] Gastrointestinal Gastrointestinal ## 7 Levels: Fall Gastrointestinal Infection Medication Other ... Procedure paretochart(ae.cat)
